explanation: The page provides a guide for a questionnaire for farmers for the year 2023
The page provides a guide for a questionnaire for farmers for the year 2022
The page provides download links for the eFisc2023 tax declaration software for various operating systems
The page provides information on electronic legal transactions according to the ordinance on electronic transmission in the context of civil and criminal proceedings
The page contains various documents and guidelines related to agricultural controls and regulations, including links to tools and manuals

The page provides a guide for GIS data capture and links to learning videos related to the LAGIS system
